name: Wed' could go wrong
description:
Joining together all familymembers and friends at a wedding while keeping everybody happy with their assigned seats surely counts twoards one of the most challenging things in life! Are you prepared to handle the charming, fun and chaotic way of playing a completely untested Game?!!

"Wed' could go wrong?!" is a highscore driven managment game that puts you in the shoes of a weddingplanner in order to fullfill the various needs of your guests. The party is over when uncle Bob starts fighting with the grooms Brother again.

Use a simple drag an drop mechanic to place guests of a wedding to the right seats. They will complain about just anything! Be aware of the Angry-O'-meter on the left. If your guests aren't pleased by their seatlocation they will get angry and you'll get in trouble!
